title: Alternative Medicine for Managing Pain & Other Symptoms | HSS
description: Alternative medical treatments can be effective in treating arthritis & other conditions. Learn more about the many different types of alternative medicine.
cleaned_text: Alternative medicine is a broad term for a number nontraditional medical treatments such as acupuncture, acupressure, biofeedback, pilates, qigong (chi kung), yoga and more. Specialists at HSS utilize many types of alternative medicine as components for treating patients with arthritis and other chronic conditions. Learn more from the articles below. Or
